PathOfBuilding.Notes:
3.18 Sentinel League - Min-Max DO Occultist Cost of Gear
May 26th = 2 weeks after League Start
1 Exalted Orb = 170 Chaos Orbs
--------------------------------------------------------
Gear
Bow = 5ex Quiver = 2ex Helmet with Enchant = 100c Death's Oath with Colours = 20c Gloves = 2ex~ Boots = 1ex~ Amulet = 15c + 60c(oils) Rare Ring = 30c or more Magic Ring = 20c??? Belt = 1ex Abyss Jewel = 10c? Large Cluster Jewel = 40c Medium Cluster Jewels = 25c+25c = 50c Small Cluster Jewel = 10c Glorious Vanity = 15c Transcendent Mind = 150c
12ex+520c = 12ex+3ex
Cost of Gear = 15ex or 2550chaos
***
If using Bastion of Elements Jewels set
Forbidden Flesh = 3ex Forbidden Flame = 7ex
15exalts+10exalts = 25ex or 4250chaos
***
If using Inspired Learning
Inspired Learning = 2ex
--------------------------------------------------------
Gems
*** Bow
Caustic Arrow 21/20 = 50c Concentrated Effect 21/20 = 1.3ex Awakened Void Manipulation 1/20 = 1ex Awakened Swift Affliction 1/20 = 1ex Awakened Vicious Projectiles 1/20 = 10c Empower 3/0 = 50c
3.3ex + 110c
Cost of Bow Gems = 3.95ex or 671chaos
*** Body Armor
Efficacy 21/20 = 100c Lifetap 21/20 = 130c Less Duration 21/20 = 60c Awakened Void Manipulation 1/20 = 1ex Awakened Swift Affliction 1/20 = 1ex Awakened Increased Area of Effect 1/20 = 4ex
6ex + 290c
Cost of Body Armor Gems = 7.7ex or 1310chaos
*** Extra Gems worthy of Notice
Enlighten 3/0 = 2ex
*** Cost of all Gems for Build
13.65ex or 2320chaos
--------------------------------------------------------
Cost of Entire Character
25~30ex for Min-Max Version 2 weeks into the League.
35-40ex if using Flame & Flesh Jewels.
45ex~ or 7650chaos
